Posts.Content: hi its sue ,my first thread is on page 3 ,this is a update from that.ive gone 2 years ,4 months with secondary breast cancer (that spread to my liver)and my health has been good .I found out last week that its back again,this time its got my lungs aswell,it was found in a routine scan,totally unexpected.its took me a week to absorb the information ,as I'm still in good health,is there anyone out there in a similar situation ,as i don't know what to expect next.at the moment its not a mass on my lungs its lots of specs . iv not been told how it will progress or what to expect regarding symptom's iv had no information at all.
Posts.Title: my second thread cancer returns again
